title: Areas where olives and figs are grown

content.question: Which of the following best explains the significance of a similarity among locations where olives, figs, grapes and lemons are grown?

choices.label: Extensive agriculture is practiced in a humid continental climate.
Plantation agriculture is practiced in a tropical wet climate.
Intensive agriculture is practiced in a humid subtropical climate.
Extensive agriculture is practiced in a tropical wet and dry climate.
Intensive agriculture is practiced in a Mediterranean climate.

content.answer: Intensive agriculture is practiced in a Mediterranean climate.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
